-- test: env list all properties --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} env
-- expect --
java.version
-- expect --
spring.application.name


-- test: env output name only --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} env -o name
-- expect --
spring.application.name
-- expect --
java.version
-- expect --
JAVA_HOME


-- test: env query specific property --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} env java.version
-- expect --
NAME:
-- expect --
VALUE:
-- expect --
SOURCE:


-- test: env filter by pattern --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} env --filter spring.application
-- expect --
spring.application.name
-- expect --
spring.application.version
-- expect --
spring.application.pid
-- expect:not --
java.version
